sentences.en: "But finance is far more serious." — "Well I don't know really."
sentences.cn: “但是财政更加困难了。”——“是吗，我真不知道。”

sentences.en: A finance house made a bid to buy up the entire company.
sentences.cn: 一家信贷公司出价买下了整个公司.

sentences.en: Finance is not within the compass of this department.
sentences.cn: 财政不在这个部门的管辖范围之内.

sentences.en: Finance Ministers are meeting today in Brussels with Britain in the chair.
sentences.cn: 财政部部长们今天在布鲁塞尔碰头，会议由英国主持。

sentences.en: Foreign Office officials assisted with transport and finance problems.
sentences.cn: 外交部官员帮助解决运输和经费问题。

sentences.en: government/public/personal finances
sentences.cn: 政府 / 公共 / 个人财力

sentences.en: He majored in finance at Claremont Men's College in California.
sentences.cn: 他在加利福尼亚州的克莱尔蒙特男子学院主修金融专业。

sentences.en: Housing finance is less developed in continental Europe.
sentences.cn: 住房金融业在欧洲大陆的发展程度较低。

sentences.en: leasing and other forms of business finance
sentences.cn: 租赁及其他商业金融形式

sentences.en: My brother is very comfortably off. He has a career in finance.
sentences.cn: 我的哥哥很富有, 他从事金融业.

sentences.en: Neither Anna nor I are interested in high finance.
sentences.cn: 安娜和我对巨额融资都不感兴趣。

sentences.en: Russia’s finance minister
sentences.cn: 俄罗斯财政部长

sentences.en: The concerts are financed by the Arts Council.
sentences.cn: 音乐会由艺术协会出资举办。

sentences.en: The finance director is subpoenaed by prosecution.
sentences.cn: 财务经理被检查机关传讯.

sentences.en: The finance minister backtracked on his decision.
sentences.cn: 财政部长收回了他的决定。

sentences.en: The Finance Minister has renewed his call for lower interest rates.
sentences.cn: 财政部长再次呼吁降低利率。

sentences.en: the lexicon of finance and economics
sentences.cn: 财经词汇

sentences.en: The Ministry of Finance consistently overestimated its budget deficits.
sentences.cn: 财政部一贯高估预算赤字.

sentences.en: The scheme offers seed corn finance with loans at only 4% interest.
sentences.cn: 该方案提供种子基金融资，其贷款只收取4%的利息。

sentences.en: the world of high finance
sentences.cn: 高级金融界
